an4.1:1: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—​ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati bhaṇḍagāme. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:  "bhikkhavo"ti.
an4.1:2: "Catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca. Katamesaṁ catunnaṁ.
an4.1:3: Idamavoca bhagavā. Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
an4.1:4: "Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca,vimutti ca anuttarā;Anubuddhā ime dhammā,gotamena yasassinā.
an4.1:5: Iti buddho abhiññāya,dhammamakkhāsi bhikkhunaṁ;Dukkhassantakaro satthā,cakkhumā parinibbuto"ti.
